TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChtmlTextWriter extends System.Web.UI.Html32TextWriter

summary.span: 將一系列 cHTML 特定字元和文字寫入 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的輸出資料流。

span.span: Writes a series of cHTML-specific characters and text to the output stream of an ASP.NET server control.

summary.span: 類別提供格式化功能，當 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項向用戶端呈現 cHTML 內容時會使用這些格式化功能。

span.span: The class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering cHTML content to clients.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 壓縮的 HTML 或 cHTML 是 HTML 2.0、 HTML 3.2 和 HTML 4.0 的子集，而且為了呈現上具有有限的記憶體和 CPU 資源，以及受限制的格式化功能，以及有限的數目的輸入選項 （例如行動電話的小型顯示螢幕的裝置觸控板）。Compact HTML, or cHTML, is a subset of HTML 2.0, HTML 3.2, and HTML 4.0, and is designed to render on devices with limited memory and CPU power, along with small display screens, limited formatting capabilities, and a limited number of input options (such as a cell phone touch pad). 因此，cHTML 不支援下列：Therefore, cHTML does not support the following: - JPEG 影像。JPEG images. - 資料表。Tables. - 影像對應。Image maps. - 多個字元的字型和樣式。Multiple character fonts and styles. - 背景色彩和影像。Background colors and images. - 框架。Frames. - 樣式表。Style sheets. 類別衍生自類別和其功能的大部分由提供和基底類別之所有標記的文字寫入器，也就是類別。The class derives from the class and much of its functionality is provided by the and the base class for all markup text writers, which is the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立一個名為`CustomChtmlTextWriter`衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class named `CustomChtmlTextWriter` that is derived from the class. 它會建立兩個建構函式，並會覆寫方法，以防止`bgcolor`從正在寫入的輸出資料流的樣式屬性物件。It creates two constructors and overrides the method to prevent the `bgcolor` style attribute from being written to the output stream of the object. 它也會建立名為類別`ChtmlCustomPageAdapter`，定義一種方法， `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`，建立並傳回的執行個體`CustomChtmlTextWriter`類別。It also creates a class named `ChtmlCustomPageAdapter` that defines one method, `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`, which creates and returns an instance of the `CustomChtmlTextWriter` class. `CustomChtmlTextWriter`然後再轉譯 cHTML 內容頁面，即可使用 cHTML 標記的瀏覽器的裝置。The `CustomChtmlTextWriter` then renders cHTML content for a page to devices with browsers that use cHTML markup. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that uses the constant to indent lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別都有兩個建構函式，並針對所有類別直接或間接衍生自標準類別。The class has two constructors, which is standard for all classes that derive directly or indirectly from the class. 建構函式，可接受的執行個體類別做為參數，會呼叫第二個建構函式，並將其傳遞兩個參數值：The constructor, which takes an instance of the class as a parameter, calls the second constructor and passes it two parameter values: - 。The . - 中指定的字串值欄位中，它會定義可由 XHTML 文字寫入器的索引標籤間距。The string value that is specified in the field, which defines the tab spacing that is used by the XHTML text writer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立一個名為`ChtmlCustomPageAdapter`並定義一種方法， `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`，建立並傳回的執行個體`CustomChtmlTextWriter`類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a class named `ChtmlCustomPageAdapter` and defines one method, `CreateCustomChtmlTextWriter`, which creates and returns an instance of the `CustomChtmlTextWriter` class. `CustomChtmlTextWriter`然後再轉譯 cHTML 內容頁來使用 cHTML 標記的瀏覽器的裝置。The `CustomChtmlTextWriter` then renders cHTML content for pages to devices with browsers that use cHTML markup. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式，採用的這兩個執行個體類別和字串做為參數，呼叫建立的執行個體時，會使用相同參數的建構函式類別。The constructor, which takes both an instance of the class and a string as parameters, calls the constructor that takes the same parameters when it creates an instance of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為自訂類別`CustomChtmlTextWriter`衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom class named `CustomChtmlTextWriter` that is derived from the class. 它會建立兩個建構函式可讓您建立的自訂類別執行個體具有相同的模式為所有的類別衍生，直接或間接從類別。It creates two constructors that you can use to create an instance of the custom class with the same pattern as all classes that derive, directly or indirectly, from the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#1)]

summary.span: 判斷指定的 cHTML 屬性和其值是否在提出要求的網頁上呈現。

span.span: Determines whether the specified cHTML attribute and its value are rendered to the requesting page.

summary.span: 您可以從 類別衍生的類別中覆寫 方法，篩選出不要在支援 cHTML 之裝置上呈現的屬性。

span.span: You can override the method in classes that derive from the class to filter out attributes that you do not want to render on devices that support cHTML.

returns.span: 表示將屬性及其值寫入 輸出資料流，否則為 。

span.span: to write the attribute and its value to the output stream; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，方法會防止全域隱藏的屬性中所列屬性和項目特定、 隱藏的屬性中所列屬性從正在寫入輸出資料流。By default, the method prevents globally suppressed attributes that are listed in the property and element-specific, suppressed attributes that are listed in the property from being written to the output stream. 您可以覆寫的行為衍生自的類別中方法類別。You can override the behavior of the method in classes that are derived from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用自訂的類別會覆寫方法，以防止`bgcolor`cHTML 輸出資料流寫入的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use a custom class that overrides the method to prevent the `bgcolor` attribute from being written to the cHTML output stream. 然後它會呼叫基底所提供的功能方法從類別，以確保使用其預設行為，太。It then calls the functionality that is provided by the base method from the class to ensure that its default behavior is used, too. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/cs/chtmltextwriter.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample4/vb/chtmltextwriter.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 cHTML 項目`span`項目，方法會傳回`false`。If the cHTML element is a `span` element, the method returns `false`. 所有其他的標記，它會傳回`true`。For all other tags, it returns `true`.

summary.span: 將 項目寫入 cHTML 輸出資料流中。

span.span: Writes a element to the cHTML output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法插入線條切割成 cHMTL 資料流。Use the method to insert a line break into a stream of cHMTL. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何建立 cHTML 類別和自訂屬性。The first code example demonstrates how to create a cHTML class and custom properties. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何在網頁上使用的自訂類別。The second code example demonstrates how to use a custom class on a Web page. 若要使用自訂`ChtmlSimplelabelAdapter`配接器，加入下列程式碼會為適當全機器的檔案的子目錄中的.NET Framework 組態目錄或自訂瀏覽器檔案 App_Browsers 底下的目錄中的 Web 瀏覽器應用程式根目錄。To use the custom `ChtmlSimplelabelAdapter` adapter, add the following code to either the appropriate machine-wide file in the subdirectory for the browser of the .NET Framework configuration directory or to a custom browser file in the App_Browsers directory under the Web application root. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立名為 cHTML 配接器類別`ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter`類別，名為`SimpleLabel`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a cHTML adapter class named `ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter` for a class named `SimpleLabel`. 它會建立自訂`Control`屬性，可讓`ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter`類別來存取的成員`SimpleLabel`類別，然後再覆寫方法。It creates a custom `Control` property that allows the `ChtmlSimpleLabelAdapter` class to access the members of the `SimpleLabel` class, and then overrides the method. 在覆寫時，會發生下列事項：In the override, the following things occur: - 它會建立參考物件，名為`w`，其衍生自物件傳遞為`writer`參數方法。It creates a reference to a object, named `w`, which is derived from the object that is passed as the `writer` parameter for the method. - 它會建立字串，並將它設定為等於`SimpleLabel.Text`值。It creates a string and sets it equal to the `SimpleLabel.Text` value. - 它會呼叫方法，以套用所定義的樣式屬性 cHTML 標籤的輸出資料流。It calls the method to apply the styles that are defined by the property of the label to the cHTML output stream. - 它會將寫入`Text`屬性值的資料流和關閉樣式區塊，藉由呼叫方法。It writes the `Text` property value to the stream and closes the style block by calling the method. - 它會呼叫方法以呈現`br`輸出資料流之後的文字及樣式呈現的項目。It calls the method to render a `br` element to the output stream after the text and styles render. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/chtmltestlabel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/chtmltestlabel.vb#2)] 下列範例示範如何使用`SimpleLabel`在網頁中的類別。The following example demonstrates how to use the `SimpleLabel` class in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/cs/chtmltestlabel.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ChtmlTextWriter_Sample1/VB/chtmltestlabel.aspx#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void WriteEncodedText (string text);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteEncodedText(string text) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub WriteEncodedText (text As String)
public: override void WriteEncodedText(System::String ^ text);

param.name: text
param.span: 要編碼及寫入輸出資料流的文字字串。

span.span: The text string to encode and write to the output stream.

summary.span: 為要求的裝置編碼指定的文字，然後將其寫入輸出資料流。

span.span: Encodes the specified text for the requesting device, and then writes it to the output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文字參數傳遞至方法`null`或長度為零，則不寫入任何資料。If the text parameter passed into the method is `null` or has a length of zero, then nothing is written. 使用方法的字串包含角括號時 (\<或 >) 或連字號 (&) 和您想要確保它們會正確轉譯要求的裝置上。Use the method when a string contains angle brackets (\< or >) or an ampersand (&) and you want to ensure that they are rendered correctly on the requesting device. 方法會使用基底類別的方法。The method uses the base class's method.
